card.name: White Knight HEAVEN, Lord of Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Angel Commands. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all non-light creatures in the battle zone into their owners shields face down. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when this creature attacks, or when this creature leaves the battle zone you may cast a spell from your opponent's graveyard without cost. Then put that card on the bottom of its owner's deck. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Demon Commands. Triple Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability.) {BB}: Discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution Armored Dragons or Evolution Fire Birds. When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses the creature in their battle zone with the lowest power and destroys it. God Slayer (Whenever this creature would battle a God, after the battle destroy that God.) Triple Breaker When this creature is destroyed, your opponent chooses the creature in their battle zone with the lowest power and destroys it. Then, destroy the creature with the lowest power in your battle zone. Afterwards, you may put a non-evolution Dragon into the battle zone from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. Triple Breaker Whenever you summon a non-evolution creature during your turn, search your deck. You may put any number of cards from your deck with the same name as that creature and put them into the battle zone. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Blocker". Whenever your creatures block, that creature breaks 1 of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, both players reveal the top card of their decks. If both cards are spells with different costs, the player with the highest cost spell may cast it without cost. If both cards are creatures with different powers, the player with the highest power creature may summon it without cost. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your Evolution creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all of your creatures into the battle zone from your graveyard. Then, your opponent puts all of their creatures into the battle zone from their graveyard. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Armored Dragons or Origins. Double Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability.) {BB}: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 7000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Giants. When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put 1 of these cards face-down into your shields, 1 into your mana zone, and 1 into your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Blocker" Double Breaker Any effect that would prevent your creatures with "Blocker" from attacking is negated. (This includes summoning sickness, this creature can't attack, and this creature can't attack players.) At the end of your turn, untap all of your creatures in the battle zone that have "White Knight" in their name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each creature in your battle zone you may choose 1 of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Whenever cards with "White Knight" in their name are put into your hand from your shield zone, they all gain "Shield Trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose your creatures, they can't choose creatures with 6000 power or more. (That creature can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race or Origins Double Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability). {BB}: Destroy 1 of your other creatures. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature. You may put that creature into the battle zone. Then shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever your creatures with "Reaper" in their name would leave the battle zone due to an opponent's spell, they stay in the battle zone instead. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return 1 creature with 6000 power or more from your graveyard to your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put 1 of your other creatures with "Reaper" in their name into the battle zone, you may return a creature that has a cost less than that creature and has "Reaper" in its name to your hand from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card from it. Your opponent may discard that card. If they don't, they discard all other cards in their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Wan Ken, Crimson Lord" in its name. Soulshift (When you summon this creature, this creature's cost is reduced by the base creature's cost. However, it can't cost less than 1.) Double Breaker Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Destroy all of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less. Search your deck. You may choose a creature with "Lord Gou Ken" in its name from it and put it on this creature. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: God Link - Macbeth, King of the Gods (Right Side) or Lia, King of the Gods (Top Side) Whenever this creature links with another God, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less. This creature can't be attacked or blocked by light creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your Dragons or Fire Birds are destroyed, you may return that creature to your deck and shuffle it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Evolution: Choose a nature creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. At the end of your turn, if your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you do in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a non-evolution creature into your mana zone from your battle zone. If you do, put an evolution creature into the battle zone with a cost equal to or less than the number of cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card has "White Knight" in its name you may add it to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When this creature is destroyed, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. Saver: Power 6000 or more

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability.) {BB}: Your opponent puts the top 4 cards of their deck into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Search your deck. You may choose a card with "Wan Ken, Crimson Lord" in its name and put it on top of this creature. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your creatures with "Reaper" in its name. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your other creatures with "Reaper" in their names would be destroyed, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a creature that has 6000 power or more into the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, after the attack destroy it. When this creature is destroyed, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 of the revealed cards with "Grave Evolution" into your hand. Then, put the other cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deck Evolution: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature, put this creature into the battle zone on top of the revealed creature. If the revealed card isn't a creature return this creature to your hand. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability.) {BB}: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Bird you may put it into the battle zone. If that card isn't a Fire Bird put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If your opponent added a shield during their previous turn, choose 3 of your opponent's shields and put the rest of their shields into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Break Bonus (After this creature's attack, if this creature is still in the battle zone, for each shield this creature broke you may activate the following {BB} ability.) {BB}: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: God Link - Othello, King of the Gods (Right Side) or Titus, King of the Gods (Bottom Side) Whenever this creature links with another God, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. This creature can't be attacked or blocked by darkness creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 of these cards with "White Knight" in its name into your hand. Then, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, untap 1 creature in your battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add 1 card in your hand to your shields face down. If you have a creature in your battle zone with 6000 power or more, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose an evolution creature from it and show it to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck and put the chosen card on top of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose 1 creature in the battle zone, and return it to its owner's hand. If you have a creature in your battle zone with 6000 power or more, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures in the battle zone gain "Slayer". Whenever your Dragons attack, you may return 1 creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. This turn, that creature gets -1000 power. (A creature with 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of your other creatures in the battle zone with "Reaper" in their names gain "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures. If you have a creature in your battle zone with 6000 power or more, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a creature with "NEX" in its name battles, you may destroy this creature. If you do, untap that creature and it wins the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 1000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker". If you have a creature in your battle zone with 6000 power or more, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your evolution creatures are destroyed, you may put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put 1 of your opponent's creatures with 5000 power or less into their mana zone. If you have a creature in your battle zone with 6000 power or more, you may draw a card.
